metadata.Title: CVE-2023-34967 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Samba Spotlight mdssvc RPC Request Type Confusion Denial-of-Service Vulnerability

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-34967` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ctdb - 2:4.16.8+dfsg-0ubuntu1.2
ldb-tools - 2:4.16.8+dfsg-0ubuntu1.2
libldb2 - 2:4.16.8+dfsg-0ubuntu1.2
libnss-winbind - 2:4.16.8+dfsg-0ubuntu1.2
libpam-winbind - 2:4.16.8+dfsg-0ubuntu1.2
libsmbclient - 2:4.16.8+dfsg-0ubuntu1.2
libwbclient0 - 2:4.16.8+dfsg-0ubuntu1.2
python3-ldb - 2:4.16.8+dfsg-0ubuntu1.2
python3-samba - 2:4.16.8+dfsg-0ubuntu1.2
registry-tools - 2:4.16.8+dfsg-0ubuntu1.2
samba - 2:4.16.8+dfsg-0ubuntu1.2
samba-common - 2:4.16.8+dfsg-0ubuntu1.2
samba-common-bin - 2:4.16.8+dfsg-0ubuntu1.2
samba-dsdb-modules - 2:4.16.8+dfsg-0ubuntu1.2
samba-libs - 2:4.16.8+dfsg-0ubuntu1.2
samba-testsuite - 2:4.16.8+dfsg-0ubuntu1.2
samba-vfs-modules - 2:4.16.8+dfsg-0ubuntu1.2
smbclient - 2:4.16.8+dfsg-0ubuntu1.2
winbind - 2:4.16.8+dfsg-0ubuntu1.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: samba package in kinetic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:4.16.8+dfsg-0ubuntu1.2').
